emuInput.TitMainTitle: Mrs. E. C. English, Mrs. Ralph Houston, Irv Griffin, and Helen Duncan gathered around newspaper, in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper printing plant
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 22, 1946, pg. 20, reads: "Visit Courier Plant - Among the recent visitors to The Pittsburgh Courier plant were (left to right): Mrs. E. C. English and Mrs. Ralph Houston of Albuquerque, N. M.; Irv Griffin, graduate of the University of Pittsburgh; Mrs. Helen Duncan of East Orange, N. J. Mrs. Duncan and the other out-of-towners were guests of Miss Marilyn Duncan who received her master of science degree last week from the School of Applied Social Sciences at the University of Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
